https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The comedy group Slow Children Crossing meets in a private apartment to rehearse a new sketch between a microwave and a refrigerator. After the rehearsal the actors discuss marketing strategies for attracting greater media attention to their group. Before the Rehearsal
